topic.title: Pilot Bundle with Dell EqualLogic Storage added
topic.shortdesc: The Pilot Bundle with Dell EqualLogic Storage has the same characteristics as the Pilot Bundle with Ceph Storage; the only change is the Storage backend software , hardware and networking. The storage node servers are supplemented with one or more Dell EqualLogic arrays.

body.p: The Pilot bundle shown has a single Dell EqualLogic Storage Array; this can be one or more depending on your Application and Storage needs. Prior to ordering your Sales Representative will work to find the proper configuration for your needs.
